mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gm_paid(user_no, group_no, gm_no, paid, rec_date) VALUES(#{user.userNo}, #{group.groupNo}, #{groupMoney.gmNo}, #{paid}, #{recDate, jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.select: SELECT a.user_no, a.group_no, a.gm_no, paid, a.rec_date, b.gm_price FROM gm_paid a left outer join group_money b on a.gm_no = b.gm_no WHERE a.group_no = #{groupNo} AND paid = 'Y'

SELECT a.gm_no, a.group_no, a.user_no, a.paid, a.rec_date, b.user_name, b.tel, b.email FROM gm_paid a left outer join tb_user b on a.user_no = b.user_no WHERE a.gm_no = #{gmNo} AND a.group_no = #{group.groupNo}
